name: Secret Handshake
description:
Secret Handshake

You're the new kid in town.

The only way to climb the food chain is to make friends in the right places - except around these parts, people only talk if you're cool enough to know their secret handshakes.

Do you have what it takes to fake it 'til you make it?

This game is part of the No Moss Studios Patreon Collections. For $2, patrons get access to 2 new games a month! Follow us on our journey here:
